content.title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Special Projects
content.department: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
content.details: The Special Projects component of PMKVY envisages the creation of a platform that will facilitate trainings in special areas and/or premises of Government bodies, corporates or industry bodies, and training in special job roles, not defined under the available Qualification Packs (QPs)/National Occupational Standards (NOS). Special Projects require some deviation from the short-term training guidelines under PMKVY. The objective of Special Projects under PMKVY 3.0 (2020-21) is to undertake project-based skilling interventions, primarily to meet the skilling needs of marginalized or vulnerable groups.
benefits: Counselling through Online Information / Counselling Platform, Counselling Helpline, and District-level skill information centre
Training in Digital Content, Soft Skills, Entrepreneurship, Financial and Digital Literacy
One-time incentive to all certified candidates
eligibility: Marginalized or vulnerable groups such as Scheduled Castes and Tribes, transgender, persons with disabilities, women, economically backward people
Individuals from difficult/remote geographies, hard to reach areas
content.application_process: Online. A manual is available on the Skill India Portal for understanding the process.
documents_required: As required for the job role

faqs.question: What will be the coverage of Accidental Insurance?
faqs.answer: Every certified candidate will be provided with three-year accidental insurance (Kaushal Bima) of Rs. 2 lakhs.

faqs.question: What are the job roles for which training are offered?
faqs.answer: There are 332 job roles from various sectors under which training is offered for this scheme.

faqs.question: What are PMKVY Special Projects?
faqs.answer: Fresh Skilling Projects which may not be conducted through STT due to the rules & regulation drafted in STT may be considered for Special Project on a case to case basis.

faqs.question: Who can apply for PMKVY Special Projects?
faqs.answer: Any Training Provider, Corporate, Government Institution, Association and NGO subject to Scheme guidelines and qualification factor under Special Projects.
